name: Infinity
detailed_description:
Infinity is a VR magic shooting & Dota game that supports HTC Vive.

Players will choose their favorite characters to fight alongside their teammates on the battlefield.

Helping your own troops to defeat their opponents through different tactical designs and skill combinations(shooting/ blocking/ area spell).

Victory conditions - break the opponent's base camp or scramble more strongholds when time's up.

Features:

1. 8 pre-designed characters for choosing and players can feel free to select factions or start point.

2. Provide a pre-designed spell packs, included magic shooting/ blocking/ area spell with different effects(slip/ stun). Defeat with enemies with the magic and help ally to get the victory.

3. Provide smoothly somatosensory magic shooting/ blocking, the Top player even can be unharmed in multiplayer fighting.

4. Reduce the burden during playing with well-designed moving and easy to understood operation.e.

Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7/10
  • Processor: Intel i5-4590 equivalent or greater
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 970 equivalent or greater
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 12 GB available space
